div.h3: KEYSTONE CENTRAL SCHOOL DISTRICT Facilities Committee Meeting May 5, 2020

div.p: The Keystone Central School District Board of School Directors will hold a Facilities Committee Meeting, on Tuesday, May 5, 2020, beginning at 1:30 pm. Meeting will be held virtually using Zoom. Please use the link below to join:
If you are not able to join by videoconferencing, you may call in using the following number:

a.title: Visit KEYSTONE CENTRAL SCHOOL DISTRICT Facilities Committee Meeting May 5, 2020 Page

a.title: FREE AND REDUCED MEAL APPLICATION UPDATE:
a.aria-label: FREE AND REDUCED MEAL APPLICATION UPDATE:

div.span: FREE AND REDUCED MEAL APPLICATION UPDATE:

a.div: If your family's income has changed since March 16, 2020 due to the COVID-19 pandemic and you feel your child/children now qualify for free or reduced meals, PLEASE FILL OUT AN UPDATED MEAL APPLICATION either electronically through EZ School Pay or by filling out a paper application. Applications will remain current through the beginning of October 2020. Click here for the free and reduced meal application.

span.data-emptytext: Keystone Central School District provides equal opportunity in its programs, activities, and employment
span.data-value: Keystone Central School District provides equal opportunity in its programs, activities, and employment. Proud to Serve Clinton County and portions of Centre and Potter Counties

p.span: Keystone Central School District provides equal opportunity in its programs, activities, and employment. Proud to Serve Clinton County and portions of Centre and Potter Counties

p.a: Website Hosting Solution Powered by SchoolBlocks

div.h3:
Welcome to the SchoolBlocks
self-guided tour!
div.p: The most common question we receive is, how is SchoolBlocks inspired by Pinterest? SchoolBlocks eliminates navigation bars and uses a block style layout thats similar to Pinterest. It creates a unique and engaging browsing experience, optimizes for mobile and removes a lot of navigational complexity.
Please click on the red plus signs found on this page to learn more about specific features.

button.class: btn btn-default
btn sb-organization-color-element-bg

div.p: As an administrator, you will have the custom page editing tools auto-load. Just click read more to access our advanced page editing tools.
This bar holds all content types. Click on the Admin button, click "add block", select a content type, add your content then insert the block into the page.
This icon appears when you have edit permissions. Hold your mouse down and move the block. Youll see the page reorganize!
Each block type has a custom editing experience. Click the pencil on any block or view our help documentation to learn more about block types.
